item.description: Come show your support for GWH and secular values in Central Massachusetts by joining us for the 4th of July Parade in Fitchburg, MA. Many local churches and religious groups take part, and it would send a strong message if our secular community came out in strength to support our values. We will be meeting at 8:30am in front of the 99 Restaurant on Summer Street. We will have our banner & t-shirts (which is optional - if you would rather not wear one, we ask you wear a bright blue shirt/t-shirt) Hope to see you there! Please sign up soon - the earlier the better!
item.name: Humanist Excursion - Represent GWH in the Fitchburg 4th of July Parade!
